issue.title: Use radio toggles (yes/no = green/red) for perimeter selection
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Since #992 has been accepted, we only have to values for each perimeter (available or not) in diffusion view.
And the list is not very readable:
!perimeters_list.png!

I propose to use radio toggles (like in pricing profiles) :
!pricing_example.png!

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC has validated this enhancement.
